title: Railworks TS2014  TaD ProLine Riviera Line
description:
This Trains and Drivers ProLine scenariopack features accurate commuter traffic on the Riviera Line: Exeter - Paignton  for your  Train Simulator. Experience this wonderful  coast line  while working the different services around the route.  This scenariopack features no less then 10 scenarios with timetabled, realistic services and a highly detailed and accurrate AI traffic.


TaD - Airshow Special
It's the day of the Dalwish Airshow and extra trains are running for the event. Drive Train 2F43 from Paignton to Exeter following Train 2F41 along the coast to pick up the remaining passengers from the Airshow. Then form Train 5F43 and return to Exeter TMD to split your train and stable it for the night.

TaD - Last train down the coast
Drive Train 2T20, the last train to Paignton, and the return back to Exeter St. Davids, Train 2E67. This is a nice quiet run, but watch the line near Dawlish as a possession is planned for the night.

TaD - Rush Hour Coast Run
Drive Train 2E40 from Paignton to Exeter, but keep a close eye on the line as you follow the late running Train 2F17.

TaD - CrossCountry along the Coast
Starting 30 minutes late, drive Train 5M29 from Netwton Abbot to Paignton in time to form Train 1M29 to Manchester Piccadilly, which you shall take as far as Exeter. It's ice Cold so be careful when speeding up and slowing down.

TaD - Race up the Coast
Drive Train 2F45 from Paignton to Exeter on a clear summer afternoon, but will everything go according to plan?

TaD - Doubled Up
Shunt together two Class 150 DMU Units to form Train 2T08 to Paignton. Can you prepare the train in time for your scheduled departure off Exeter?

TaD - Coast to Capital
Drive Train 1A87 from Paignton to Exeter on a foggy afternoon.

TaD - Summer Heat
It's a schorching how summer's day on the Riviera Line and you're taking Train 1V47 from Exeter to Paignton. There have been a few reports of train failures due to overheating components this week due to the weather, so watch out when using the brakes.

Bonus scenarios:

TaD Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Steam up the Sea
*Drive Train 5Z45 from Newton Abbot to Paignton where you pick up the railtour to London Paddington, which you shall take as far as Exeter.

TaD - Deltic down the sea
Drive Train 1Z55 from Exeter to Paignton fitting in around the morning trains. Then you shall be returning to Exeter light engine as 5Z55.
